name: Froggen
description:
Froggen is a 2D Side-scrolling adventure.

You are a frog with a very large tongue that has broken the sacred statue of Biblub's Town.

They tell you to restore the missing pieces of the statue and give them back in order to fix the statue.

This pieces are separated in different zones and someone must find them!

Keep in mind that this game is currently in Beta, some bugs may show up.

Controller recommended.
